name: Fistful of Seeds (syc418)
description:
A fps game with farming and crafting mechanics. Very early prototype.

The goal of the prototype will be getting the second weapon (and walk around).

A project for Brackey Game Jam 2022.1.

Solo project. Asset Credits to https://syntystore.com/

Contact syc418@gmail.com if any issue/violation/etc.

Please comment if you like the game.

Story:

Your boss sent you to explode a dead planet, collect any materials, besides theose walking ones.

Control:

WASD to move, MOUSE to look around and shoot, 

SPACE to jump, E to interact, B to bagpack
